The Email Marketing Glossary

Your guide to all the acronyms and terms in the email world you always wanted. A project from Jason Rodriguez, The Better Email, and a bunch of email friends. Contribute on GitHub.

Attribution

The process of determining which marketing efforts lead to actual conversions and sales. It's good when email marketers can attribute success back to the email channel.

Additional Resources

  • Marketing Attribution: A Guide to Models, Tools, and Strategy, Marketing Evolution
  • Everything You Wanted to Know About Marketing Attribution Models, Salesforce
  • What is marketing attribution and how do you report on it?, HubSpot
